review: I had a piercing pain in my left chest. Doctor listened to me promptly, asked follow up questions and let me know that it's most likely not because of heart issues. To confirm, he did an ECG. The results suggested that my heart is functioning normally. He also let me know what could be the possible reasons for my discomfort and suggested me some vitamin and gastric tablets. I felt this was really nice of him because even though it was established that it wasn't heart issue, he didn't leave it at that and actually tried to help me with my issue.
Dr explained everything camly, my mom was stressed because of chest pain, but dr explained her all the sympton reasons and process that nothing to worry, now she is feeling well.
Compassionate and supportive. Listens to patients and explains the issue and his recommendations. Good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ** * **** *** ** **** Very Gentle, humble, polite person, also listen problem very carefully amd calmly. Also available on just a phone call, feels like connected everytime. ** ** **** ************* ***** *** ******. My father went on CAGB surgery 2 yrs ago and on Aug 17th, he felt a massive pain in the chest area. Dr taken very quick action and handled the case very nicely. within a month, my father is started walking and feeling much better than the past. Thank you for motivating us on such a difficult situation.
Doctor is very nice but he got delayed by more than an hour. That was a problem as I was waiting for him with my 2 year old son.

My experience was good. I had two tests, Echo & TMT both are negetive. But still I feel some pain, burning sensation and pinching in my left lower chest. I don't know what is the reason. Till date I hat 7 Echo, 3 ECG, 1 TMT, 1 X-ray & 3 times Blood test. All results are negetive. I don't know what to do...

review: The doctor is quite polite & listening . I met with him regarding sensation in left part of chest , He listened humbly & gave proper time to explain the issue . Then he reached to conclusion & adviced for medication . The good part is he gave proper time to explain & adviced accordingly .

As I know Dr jaibabu since 1year he is very good experience in his field *** **** ********* ******* ************* **********,I recommends my family and friends for any type of cardiology problem I wish him good luck and continue to service many people.

*** **** *** *** ** *** **** ****** * ******** He is so calm and listens to all our health problems and explains about each and every procedure he does and they way he does the diagnostics is also awesome. After the consultation I felt really relaxed and he motivates a lot. A good human being and care takers.

It was horrible experience. Clinic was closed today. I waited for 1 hr and call them but did not get any response.
reply_text: Am sorry didn't i see you in consultation Today on August 15th. I have seen 8 other patients. Were you not satisfied. On Sunday also i see patients up to noon. Hardly you find any other cardiologist working on Sunday and August 15th. I try to work for my patient convenience. Practo is an app which hardly understands how a doctor works.. Thanks for the review. I'll take it positively work more.

review: Dr.Jai Babu is recommended any day as he is friendly and also listens to the patients comments. He doesn’t straightaway give medicines. Suggest to change diet and lifestyle. Very happy!!

. Dr. Jai Babu is a great doctor! He’s very understanding and listens to your concerns. He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist.
